parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective lift kit can cause the vehicle to not track straight or true, requiring constant correction, which can lead to accidents or loss of control, putting the driver and occupants at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle requires frequent alignments
the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Excessive Front Tire Wear due to Improper Body Installation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive front tire wear can cause the vehicle to lose traction, leading to accidents or loss of control, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The front tires wear out excessively
the tires fail inspection after 5-7K miles
the vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle vibrates while driving
the vehicle requires frequent front-end alignments.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The misalignment of the front wheels can cause the vehicle to drift or veer to one side, leading to loss of control, accidents, and safety hazards, especially during panic stops or when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle drifts or veers to one side while driving
especially when taking hands off the wheel or during braking; the vehicle pulls to one side when holding the steering wheel straight; the vehicle feels unstable or wanders while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping can cause unexpected loss of power, leading to accidents, especially when accelerating or merging with traffic.
symptoms: The transmission feels like it's slipping or hesitating
especially when accelerating or shifting gears; the vehicle hesitates or lags when trying to accelerate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty door latches can cause the doors to open while the vehicle is in motion, leading to potential ejection of occupants, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The doors do not latch properly
the doors open while the vehicle is in motion
the doors do not stay shut
the doors are difficult to close
the doors make a loud noise when closing.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Recall for Door Latch Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of a recall for the door latch issue on this specific model, despite similar recalls on other Ford models from the same year, may lead to a lack of awareness and neglect of the problem, potentially putting occupants at risk.
symptoms: None
as this is a concern about the lack of a recall rather than a specific symptom.
